thread.title: BRIEF-Crocodile Garments Says ‍Group To Sell Stake In Zhongshan Crocodile Garments Ltd

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Crocodile Garments Says ‍Group To Sell Stake In Zhongshan Crocodile Garments Ltd

organizations.name: brief-crocodile garments says ‍group to sell stake in zhongshan crocodile garments ltd

text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Crocodile Garments Ltd:
* ‍GROUP TO DISPOSE ENTIRE EQUITY INTEREST IN ZHONGSHAN CROCODILE GARMENTS LTD TO ZHONGSHAN HONG FENG REAL PROPERTY CONSULTANCY​
* ‍PURSUANT TO SHARE DISPOSAL AGREEMENT, VENDOR WILL DEPOSIT SUM OF RMB28.5 MILLION​
* GROUP EXPECTS GAIN OF RMB14.7 MILLION FROM DISPOSAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
